title: VitaDHA Baby Drops Omega 3 Liquid for Infants and Toddlers (0 to 2 Years) - Algae Oil Omega3 Drops for Kids with Vitamin D3 and E - 30ml Milk and Cream Flavour
features: OMEGA-3 FOR BABIES AND INFANTS - Specifically designed for infants and children aged 0 to 2 years, VitaDHA Baby Drops is a plant-based liquid supplement distinguished by its high DHA concentration, delivering 100 mg per dose.

FROM ALGAL OIL - Using pure DHA extracted from microalgae ensures a safe, sustainable, allergen-free choice, offering infants the benefits of Omega-3 without the potential risks associated with fish oil.

SUPPORTS GROWTH - Breast milk may lack sufficient Omega-3 and vitamin D3 to meet the nutritional needs of infants. That’s why it's important to supplement the right amount of these nutrients to promote growth and development.

EASY TO DOSE - Thanks to the dropper, you can administer up to 1 ml per day, providing the EU-recommended daily DHA intake. The gluten- and lactose-free formula makes VitaDHA Baby Drops suitable even for children with specific intolerances or sensitivities.

MILK AND CREAM FLAVOR - Along with enriching the formula with vitamins D3 and E, a delightful milk and cream flavor has been added to make DHA supplementation more enjoyable and easier for children to accept.
description: Product Description Previous page Next page Previous page Next page 1 FOR YOUR CHILDREN 2 RICH IN DHA 3 MADE IN ITALY 4 DELICIOUS FLAVOR At what age can VitaDHA Baby Drops be administered? VitaDHA Baby Drops is an Omega-3 DHA supplement formulated for infants and children from 0 to 2 years old and can be administered under adult supervision. The recommended dose is 1 ml per day for at least 1 month. How long does a vial last after opening? A vial of VitaDHA Baby Drops should be consumed within 30 days after opening. It's important to keep the vial tightly closed and in a cool, dry place to ensure its freshness and maintain the integrity of the nutrients. Does VitaDHA Baby Drops contain gluten? VitaDHA Baby Drops is gluten-free and lactose-free. This feature makes it suitable for infants and children who may be intolerant or sensitive to these components. What is the recommended daily dose? It is recommended to take 0.5 ml of the product (as indicated by the graduated dropper) twice a day. DHA in 1 ml: 100 mg Flavor: Milk and Cream Vitamins: D3 and E Caracteristics: Gluten-Free and Lactose-Free Daily Dose: Minimum 1 ml Suitable for: Infants and children from 0 to 2 years old

specifications_table.Serving Recommendation: ‎It is recommended to take 0.5 ml of the product (volume indicated by the graduated dropper) twice a day
